title: Broadband firms 'must do more to promote social tariffs'
description: The culture secretary says suppliers must do more to promote discounted rates to low-income homes.

title: Twitter moves to limit Russian government accounts
description: The platform has taken action to limit more than 300 Kremlin accounts, including President Putin's.

title: What are Elon Musk's plans for Twitter?
description: The Tesla founder has become the social network's biggest single shareholder, and a board member.

title: The Works forced to shut some shops after cyber-attack
description: The retailer said that five of its 526 shops have temporarily been shut since the attack last week.

title: Zomato and Swiggy: Indian food delivery unicorns face antitrust probe
description: The country's competition watchdog is probing allegations that the firms charge exorbitant commissions.
